message.content:
I need to identify the line item representing the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is the definition of depreciation.

Looking at the financial statements:

1. In the balance sheet, I see "Accumulated Depreciation" with an end amount of 91,505.05.
2. In the cash flow statement, I see "Depreciation" listed with an amount of 91,505.05.
3. In the income statement, I also see "Depreciation" listed with the same amount of 91,505.05.

The "Depreciation" line item in the income statement represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of assets over their useful lives for the current period. This expense of 91,505.05 is what we're looking for.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "91505.05"}}
```
